Text: Is this the CD version i.e. you can play at the higher resolutions?

I already had the free versions of these and i was wondering whether these were the full CD versions with the higher resolutions.

I've given them a try and they are! Resolutions up to 1600 x 1280. 

Thanks a lot TacticalBro- nice upload! Still the best hex based wargames ever made imo!
Thank you very much for upload. Please share other wargames if you have them.
